attributes.description:
The name says it all. The new Polo Vivo is lightweight yet vivacious, with an inherent fun character and proven Volkswagen mechanicals to underscore it. The Polo Vivo is a tenacious trooper and a potential real world hero in a space where price and dependability are key.
The Polo Vivo Sedan has great build quality and we most definitely love the interior and boot space. This specific Polo has full service history and also has a towbar fitted.

Finance available and
trade ins welcome.
